Text: 水道管に動力を繋げやすくするための堤防。\r\n 高低と左右に動力が繋がる。
Comment: -Levee that has shaft in it to power pumps.Both Horizontal and vertical

Text: 水道管に動力を繋げやすくするための堤防。\r\n全方向に動力が繋がる。
Comment: - Levee that has shaft in it to power pumps.

Text: Water wheel that also has a sloped Levee to help keep water inside channels and not overspill
A small turbine that generates power in the same direction as the shaft
